is an unincorporated village in the

.  Located in a great corner of southwestern North Carolina, a green valley 3,500 feet high surrounded by mountains rising up to 5,000 feet. It's not the foothills, but the southern crest of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Considered a mecca for recreational pursuits, Cashiers and the surrounding Sapphire Valley offers a wide array of activities from the most relaxed to the most rigorous. View waterfalls, enjoy hiking trails, lakeside activities, golf, ski, and much more.

value: content= Located in the Blue Ridge Mountains, Foxhunt Resort at Sapphire Valley offers guests an all-season resort perfect for romantic escapes, weekend getaways, corporate retreats, weddings, and more. The Blue Ridge Mountain resort features two-bedroom condos equipped with hot tubs, full kitchen or kitchenette, wood fireplaces, balconies or patios with scenic views, and much more. Close to several area attractions including ski slopes, hiking trails, wineries, shopping, and several recreational lakes, this spacious resort has something for everyone. Stay at Foxhunt Resort for a vacation you won't soon forget!
